alert.note: Alert for Uintah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 30 at 4:13PM MDT until June 30 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Utah, including the following county, Uintah. * WHEN...Until 615 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 413 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northwestern Uintah County
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
